original_text: Three sons and a daughter were born to Absalom. His daughter’s name was Tamar, and she became a beautiful woman.
korean_text: 압살롬이 아들 셋과 딸 하나를 낳았는데 딸의 이름은 다말이라 그는 얼굴이 아름다운 여자더라

sentences.original_text: Three sons and a daughter were born to Absalom.
sentences.korean_translation: 세 아들과 한 딸이 압살롬에게 태어났습니다.

sentences.original_text: and she became a beautiful woman.
